description:
This course assumes little to no prior knowledge of how to shoot a basketball. All techniques are explained and demonstrated in detail.

My goal is to help you achieve your dream of becoming a confident, effective shooter in the game of basketball by learning methods that will improve your ability to shoot within a short space of time.

With better technique, you will not hesitate to take that open or contested shot. And with better technique, you will have a higher chance of making a significant number of the shots you take.

What are the requirements?

  • A basketball
  • Access to a basketball court

What am I going to get from this course?

  • 6 dynamically demonstratedÂ lessons
  • An increase in confidence due to an improved technique
  • Learn the ideals on how to shoot a basketball straight
  • Learn how to position your feet & arms for accurate shooting
  • Learn how to fine tune your shooting for greater efficiency
  • Understand the design of a basketball and how it can help you
  • Learn how to shoot on the move
  • Discover how to stop and shoot off a catch or dribble without losing your balance
  • Learn when to release the ball when jump shooting
  • Correct bad habits that could be causing you to miss
  • Learn the secrets to help you focus on your target
title: Learn Basketball Shooting - Master The Basics & Shoot Better
